title: By the Quene. The Quenes Maiestie vnderstanding that there be certaine persons, hauing in times past the office of ministery in the churche, which nowe do purpose to vse their former office in preaching and ministery ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: By [John Day for?] Rychard Iugge, printer to the Quenes Maiestie,
notes: A proclamation forbidding ministers to preach without licence.
Publication date and proposed name of printer from STC.
At foot of page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
